description:
If you're a huge Los Angeles hockey fan, this is the app for you!  Los Angeles Hockey Fans provides you with access to the latest news, videos, stats, schedule, standings and scores. You'll always know what's happening with the team! 

You can also discuss the latest news and highlights with other Los Angeles fans using the built in chat feature. Make sure your voice is heard! 

There is no better or more comprehensive tool to stay up to date with Los Angeles. If you are a true fan, you owe it to yourself to download Los Angeles Hockey Fans today! 


** Brighthouse Labs and the Los Angeles Hockey Fans application are in no way associated with the NHL or the Los Angeles Kings. All trademarks are owned by their respective owners.
